name: Swift Kheftan / Immortal inspired light shield
description:
Super maneuverable shield made for super aggressive fighters. a relic inspired by an undying legion serving a kingdom lost to the ages. Probably existed in an alternate reality where apes ruled over the earth.

Immortals were highly trained soldiers with great numbers, if any soldier was slain during battle, another one would be ready to take that soldier's place, hence they were named immortals.

This is the lightest shield in immortals arsenal, it's half the size of Unbreakable Kheftan but way lighter. Made out of high quality wood and reinforced with leather. designed with two headed golden ape-eagle, flying in the sky, symbolizing how fast this shield is. The cut part in upper side of the shield is used for weapons like spears to poke the enemy with. It is also useful for fast bashing!

It may look that this shield provide less protection than other shields, but the true intend of this weapon is to parry and attack swiftly! This shield will not wear down it's user at all!


2K Rendered (2048x2048) 60FPS Raytraced
